Title: Prohibits city agencies in New York city from contracting with a limited liability company unless such limited liability company discloses the names of the business members
Summary: Prohibits city agencies in a city having a population of one million or more from contracting with a limited liability company unless such limited liability company discloses the names and addresses of persons having limited liability for the contractual obligations and other liabilities of the company.
LawCode: Add ยง6-102-a, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting city agencies from contracting with a limited liability company unless such limited liability company discloses the names and addresses of persons having limited liability for the contractual obligations and other liabilities of the company
